Alarms Voice.tooltip: Which voice should the ship alarm use

Read Numbers.tooltip: What informations should be read out by the ship

Alarms Volume.tooltip: Volume at which the alarms will play

Overspeed Sensibility.tooltip: Starts an alarm if the ship speed is at 1/10th of the ship distance to target or higher. Minimum at 1/10, middle at 1.5/10 maximum at 2/10

Altitude Warning Distance.tooltip: When in overspeed, allows the altitude alarm to play at a set distance. Minimum at 1km, middle at 3km maximum at 5km

Sun Warning Distance.tooltip: At which distance from the sun should an alarm play. Minimum a 3km, middle at 4.5 maximum at 6km

stallWarning.title: Enable Stall Warning
stallWarning.tooltip: Plays an alarm if the ship is falling and it's vertical speed is between 0 and 15 m/s
